job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongCompany DescriptionstrongppBYond develops AIbased network automation software delivered via an open platform enabling Telcos to embrace web scale operational models as they move to 5G and Edge CloudppJob DescriptionppbrppstrongData Science  Computer VisionnbspstrongppYou will be working with an enthusiastic team of sports aficionados and a professional league team in developing the next generation of analytics and computer vision based machine learning models for an immersive player experience to elevate their game to the next level You will be making an impact for player development and the coaching process at the highest level of sportsnbspppbrppstrongWhat success looks likestrongpulliSuccess will be measured by your ability to participate in additional BYond projects by contributing towards our IP portfolio and working with our innovation team while still ensuring customer satisfactionliulpbrppstrongWhat makes it rewardingstrongpulliIt is a good opportunity to expand in new emerging technologiesliliBeing a part of this rising company will lead you to empower yourself and become a part of this journey by helping you develop new innovative skills and pushing your limitsliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppstrongThe values we sharenbspstrongpulliDREAM BYOND ForwardThinking Creative Boldly ImaginativenbspliliBe AUTHENTIC Transparent Genuine SelfConfidentliliDEBATE ANYONE Fearlessly Vocal Intellectually Stimulating Thoughtfully ContrarianliliBUNSTOPPABLE Resilient Relentlessly Driven PersistentliliCARE to CREATE WISDOM Nonjudgmental Thoughtful EmpoweringstrongnbspstrongliulpstrongThe Skills and Background You Will BringstrongpulliMasters degree in Computer science Statistics Mathematics or related fields and academic training in Machine LearningDeep learningliliProficiency in Python Open CV Computer Vision techniques and Image ProcessingliliKnowledge of CliliGeometric math knowledge as related to Computer Visionnbsplili2 years experience in hands on coding machine learning models and dealing with image dataliliExperience with Tensorflow Pytorch OpencvliliProject experience with deep learning algorithms with computer visionliliExperience using version controlliulpbrppAdditional InformationppWhen applying for the job take the opportunity to tell us in five sentences or less what makes you the best candidate for this position and for our company and why BYond is a fit for youppPlease Note This job description is not intended to be a complete list of all responsibilities duties or skills and due to the changing nature of the job is subject to review and change at any time with or without notice BYond uses Everify and third party background check services including drug screening as part of the hiring processp
